experiences.title: Student Life Operations - Supervisor & Teaching Assistant
experiences.subtitle: Northeastern University
workDescription: Supervised daily campus operations, coordinating between departments to ensure seamless delivery of student services and activities.
Developed comprehensive training programs with interactive video content using Canva, Vyond, and Nearlife, accelerating onboarding for 50+ student workers.
Resolved student and staff inquiries through proactive communication, fostering an inclusive campus environment.
Led event coordination and monitoring initiatives that strengthened student engagement and community building across campus.
Established standardized operational procedures that improved service consistency and team efficiency.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Ipser Labs
workDescription: Engineered backend Python microservices in a distributed architecture, resolving retry logic and latency issues that improved system stability by 35%.
Built asynchronous ETL pipelines using AWS SQS and Lambda to process high-volume API data, transforming and loading results into PostgreSQL and DynamoDB with 99.9% reliability.
Conducted parallel analytics on load-testing telemetry to identify performance bottlenecks, optimizing latency by 40% and increasing throughput across critical services.
Deployed and scaled cloud-native services on AWS (EC2, ECS, S3, DynamoDB) with CloudWatch monitoring, ensuring consistent performance under variable load.
Collaborated with Java engineering teams to architect inter-service communication patterns that reduced downstream failures by 25%.

experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Cybrowse Digital Solutions
workDescription: Architected enterprise Single Page Applications using Angular and React, delivering analytics dashboards and workflow automation tools that accelerated stakeholder decision-making.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs with Java Spring Boot using layered architecture and comprehensive exception handling, reducing redundant frontend calls by 30%.
Built robust error boundaries and asynchronous state management for API integration, eliminating production UI crashes and improving application fault tolerance.
Drove incident resolution through systematic analysis of application metrics, logs, and distributed traces, cutting mean time to detection by 40%.
Participated in Agile development cycles with cross-functional teams, ensuring timely delivery of scalable, well-tested features through collaborative code reviews.
